comment.author: 34586311@N05
comment._content: Find out more about infant incubator exhibits!

comment.author: 16167252@N00
comment._content:
There's two things that's really great about his photo:

1. "Infant incubators with living infants". Does that really need to be stated?!? Sounds more like a side show.

2. The guy pointing with the cane. You don't see much pointing with canes anymore.

comment.author: 34586311@N05
comment._content: I have to agree -- but using the cane really makes a point!

comment.author: 78854631@N03
comment._content:
The man pointing the cane appears to be Harvey Scott, the editor of the Oregonian at the time. There is a statue of him at Mt.Tabor Park and several places named after him around town.Even his top hat looks like his exactly, if you Google his name.
Also, it is ironic in post above, mention of "it sounds more like a side show" because I checked on official map of L&C Expo and the Infant Incubator bldg is located in the middle of the amusement and sideshow area of the Expo called "the Trail".
